data.title: Job in het bedrijf Vinçotte in Vilvoorde
data.meta_description: Vind een leuke job als Information Security Officer (M/F/X) in Vilvoorde in het bedrijf Vinçotte
data.text:
Your responsibilities

As an Information Security Officer (M/F/X) at Vinçotte, you will play a critical role in ensuring the security and integrity of our organization's information technology. If you have a strong background in cybersecurity, a passion for protecting data, and the ability to proactively identify and address potential risks, we invite you to apply!

Your key activities for Vinçotte Belgium & Luxembourg:

Develop and implement robust security protocols and procedures to protect Vinçotte’s technological systems and data assets.

Conduct regular assessments and audits to identify vulnerabilities and potential threats, taking prompt action to mitigate risks.

Monitor and analyze security incidents, promptly investigating any breaches or suspicious activities. Participate in incident response activities, including containment, investigation, and recovery.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate security measures throughout Vinçotte’s IT systems and infrastructure.

Serve as a SPOC for customers, suppliers, partners and the KIWA Group addressing questions or issues.

Enhance effective ICT Security governance by leading the certification project 'ISO27001'.

Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and best practices in cybersecurity, providing recommendations for improvement.

Manage relationships with external security vendors and stay informed about emerging threats and solutions.

Your profile

Education: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science/Information Technology/another related field or equivalent through experience.

Languages: You are fluent Dutch in combination with a very good knowledge of the English language. If you can add French too, it's a very strong advantage!

Personal skills:

You act accountable and transparent.

You’re tech-savvy and passionate about everything IT related.

You possess excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think critically and act decisively in high-pressure situations.

You're a strong communicator, with the ability to collaborate and engage with stakeholders at all levels.

You are capable of working autonomously on projects, take ownership and delivering high quality results.

Experience & knowledge: You have a proven record as an Information Security Officer or in a similar role, with a focus on cybersecurity and risk management.

In-depth knowledge of security frameworks, standards, and best practices (e.g., NIST, CIS)? Check!

Strong understanding of network security, encryption protocols, and secure coding practices? Check!

Experience in conducting vulnerability assessments, penetration testing, and incident response? Check!

Familiarity with security tools and technologies, such as firewalls, intrusion detection/prevention systems, and SIEM solutions? Check!

Relevant technical certifications (e.g., ECIH, CEH) are highly desirable.

We offer

Interested in joining our teams?

Great! We can promise you that with us you...

can count on our Vinçotte community: enthusiastic and driven colleagues

get the chance to develop and expand your own expertise

learn to work objectively, but are also allowed to think out-of-the-box

sign up for a job with impact: your voice helps determine our policy

contribute daily to a safe, sustainable and efficient society

can count on an attractive salary supplemented with a company car, extra-legal benefits (meal vouchers, extra vacations, etc.).

Find out more about working at Vinçotte!
